::Zardus::

Zardus' wrist comp beeps as the Alliance base recieves DarkMouse's 
transmission. Zardus presses several buttons on the comp, hearing the message.

"I am currently engaged in combat," he replies, "I will talk to him after the 
battle."

He turns back to fire at Kamodia.
